Posts.Content: I had a lump under my nipple that only I could feel. Also inverted nipple at times and some discharge that was bloody once. Ultrasound came back normal. 6 months later still having same issue went back to OBGYN who sent me for diagnostic mammogram and second ultrasound. Tech found what i was talking about and now I have a core needle biopsy next Wednesday. Saw surgeon who told me he doesn't think I should worry and that it may be Fibroadenoma but I can't find where this causes inversion or discharge. I'm really worried
Posts.Title: Mammo and ultrasound normal but have discharge

Posts.Content: Bnwaters79 has updated their status I am 35 and noticed my left nipple being inverted when I removed my bra. Also nipple just looks different to me, almost like its open. A few months later I had some discharge and I could feel a pea sized lump under my nipple. Went for ultrasound which came back normal. Still thought something wasn't right. Had diagnostic mammogram Monday and ultrasound. showed a small mass under my nipple. Core biopsy is next Wednesday. Quite nervous as to what they will find.
Posts.Title: Almost relieved that I'm not crazy

Posts.Content: Funny you mentioned this. I've been reading about this and am calling OBGYN tomorrow to request a biopsy of nipple as well. Thank you for the advice
Posts.Title: Almost relieved that I'm not crazy
